billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Protects metropolitan transportation authority workers from recklessness of authority in safety, written by outlining legal relief, including injunction
summary: Protects metropolitan transit authority employees and representatives of deceased MTA employees by granting them a statutory cause of action for negligent or reckless violation of a safety standard intended to protect employees; with respect to any recovery, there shall be offset against such recovery any amounts paid pursuant to the workers' compensation law and collective bargaining agreements.
